column3: News;Phnom Penh: Firefighters were called to a fire at 2:50 amon May 8
column5: case of a fire on road 430
column8: Phnom Penh.------People near the scene said that an electric spark caused the fire to ignite. Some of them took fire extinguishers before two firefighting units arrived at the scene.------The electricity was cut to allow water to be used to put out the blaze. Some damage was reported to walls of nearby homes
column9: but there were no human injuries.------ ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/304152
